summary: Fullscreen? Alt-Tab replacement, Paste to console and Master Volume Control.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Tahoma][color=lime][size=6][b]GAME COMMANDER[/b][/size][/color][/font] [size=1]Not the voice control one...[/size][/center]
* Switch between ANY [size=3][b]fullscreen[/b][/size] game (default Skyrim) and Desktop hassle free. Also with Xbox 360 Gamepad support.
* Adjust your Master Volume within Game using hotkeys.
* Paste a command to Game console with simulated keystrokes.
[color=yellow] The use of Ctrl+Alt+key eliminates possible conflicts with Windows and Skyrim. By default configuration, you will not have an issue. If you run another program that utilises any of these uncommon hotkeys, then you may have an issue.[/color]

[size=3][b]Game Commander v1.15 is live and everything I have strived for is complete.[/b][/size]
If you happen to find a problem or can suggest methods of script cleanup (condense), please add your comment.

[color=yellow]Target OS:[/color] Windows 7, Vista and XP (x86 and x64)
[color=yellow]Install:[/color] Just extract Game Commander and run the exe or ahk version. Create a shortcut?

[b][color=lime]exe[/color][/b] (green icon) is easiest, does not require AutoHotkey or additional AHK libraries.
[b][color=yellow]ahk[/color][/b] (white icon) requires [url=http://l.autohotkey.net]AutoHotkey_L[/url] and Windows 7 or Vista require [url=http://www.autohotkey.com/community/viewtopic.php?t=23792]VA[/url] library.

[color=lime][b]Changes:[/b][/color]
[color=yellow]v1.15;[/color]
* Gone back to using Ctrl+Alt+key hotkeys
* Added a few useful additions to GUI
[color=yellow]v1.14;[/color]
* GAME COMMANDER!
* Allows custom selection of Fullscreen game. Just find the games ahk_class and submit
[color=yellow]v1.13;[/color]
* Script cleanup. No real function change, just script structure
[color=yellow]v1.12;[/color]
* COM library wasn\'t needed. VA 2.1 doesn\'t require COM library
[color=yellow]v1.11;[/color]
* WinXP volume control used a variable (vol_Step) I had set for Win 7 and Vista use only. Fixed!
[color=yellow]v1.10;[/color]
* Master Volume control now works ingame
* Now uses COM and VA libraries, included in the exe
* Supports Windows 7, Vista and XP (x86 and x64)
* Replaced some hotkeys to use Win Key instead of Ctrl+Alt

This utility is a compilation of two of my others, Direct Input Paste and Skyrim Switcher, and tweaked significantly.

Credit to AutoHotkey (GPL); Chris Mallett, Steve Gray, Lexikos and everyone who works with AutoHotkey. Thanks.
author: Guru82

files.name: Skyrim_Commander_v1_10
files.changelogHtml:
Master Volume control now works ingame
Now uses COM and VA libraries, included in the exe
Supports Windows 7, Vista and XP (x86 and x64)
Replaced some hotkeys to use Win Key instead of Ctrl+Alt
Made it sexier

files.name: Skyrim_Commander_v1_11
files.changelogHtml: WinXP volume control used a variable (vol_Step) I had set for Win 7 and Vista use only. Fixed!

files.name: Skyrim_Commander_v1_12
files.changelogHtml: COM library wasn\'t needed. VA 2.1 doesn\'t require COM library
